mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Weigle, Daniel M.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Wirt Co., W VA [Wirt County, West Virginia]
Pleasents Flats, Wirt Co., VA [Pleasents Flats, West County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Weigle, Daniel M. Patient Age: 19. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound of right leg. Musket bullet which entered two and a half inches above external muleolus of bullet lodged. Location Wounded: Cedar Creek, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/10/19. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Furlough 1864/12/17. Recovery and returned to duty.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Weigle, Daniel M.
